mapper.insert: insert ignore into bu_member_browse(member_id , good_id) values(#{memberId} , #{goodId});
mapper.select: select g.id, g.name, g.unit, g.first_drawing, g.start_time, g.end_time, g.inventory from bu_member_browse b inner join bu_good g on b.good_id = g.id where b.member_id = #{memberId}
